jobTitle: Registered Nurse - RN - Home Health and Hospice - ON CALL , PRN & FT openings

companyInfo.Competitors: Kindred Healthcare, Genesis HealthCare, Sava Senior Care

jobDescription: Heartland Home Health Care and Hospice is part of the HCR ManorCare family, a leading provider of home health care, hospice care, skilled nursing, memory care and post-acute care.  Responsible for the delivery of skilled nursing care and supportive services within the scope of the nurse's education and experience. Compliance with Heartland Corporate Standards and local, state, and federal laws, in an institutional setting, within the policies of the institution. Supplements nursing care of clients.  In return for your expertise, you'll enjoy excellent training, industry-leading benefits and unlimited opportunities to learn and grow. Be a part of the team leading the nation in healthcare.4687 - Heartland Hospice - Serving Santa Clara County, CaliforniaA minimum of six months nursing experience within the past three to five years.  100% travel on a daily basis.Job Specific Details:  We are adding positions due to growth! We are also looking for a Director of Professional Services (DPS) as well as a dynamic RN.
